price: 14. y la tierra y las montañas sean alzadas y pulverizadas de un solo golpe,
arabic: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waḥumilati al-arḍu wal-jibālu fadukkatā dakkatan wāḥidatan
